To configure TOTP you will need a Multi-Factor Authentication application. We can for example recommend:
* [[Aegis>>url:https://getaegis.app/]] on Android
* [[Ente Auth>>url:https://ente.io/auth/]] - Cross Platform
* [[FreeOTP>>url:https://freeotp.github.io/]] - Android and iOS

Once you have an TOTP application and then scan the QRCode below using that application to store the TOTP Secret in the application. Finally you will need to verify the TOTP code to finalize the configuration.
